short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome Extension that prevents the browser from launching websites, which you specify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this Chrome Extension to specify a set of terms (e.g., a website URL, or part of a URL) that you would like to block from being opened in Chrome. Toggle the extension easily to help prevent procrastination on websites.
